original_text: I say this to you people who want God's Law to have authority over you. Think carefully about what that Law really says.
korean_text: 내게 말하라 율법 아래에 있고자 하는 자들아 율법을 듣지 못하였느냐

sentences.original_text: I say this to you people
who want God's Law to have authority over you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 율법이 당신들에게 권위를 갖기 원하는 사람들에게

sentences.original_text: about what that Law really says
sentences.korean_translation: 그 율법이 정말 무엇을 말하는지에 대해
